mapper.select: select * from sys_user_permission where id = #{value} and is_deleted = 0

select up.permission_code from sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_user_role uur on u.id = uur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role_permission urp on uur.user_role_id = urp.user_role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_permission up on urp.user_permission_id = up.id where u.id = #{id} and u.is_deleted = 0
